data.name: title
data.description: Defines the title of the popover. Can be a string or a Snippet.

data.name: trigger
data.description: ID of the element that triggers the popover. It is a required prop.

data.name: position
data.description: Specifies the position of the popover relative to the trigger.

data.name: triggerEvent
data.description: Defines how the popover is triggeredâ€”by click or hover.

data.name: gap
data.description: Sets the distance between the trigger and the popover.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the animation speed of the popover.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border-radius of the popover.

data.name: shadow
data.description: Controls the shadow intensity of the popover.

data.name: closeOnClick
data.description: Determines whether the popover closes when clicking outside.

data.name: titleClasses
data.description: Allows custom classes for styling the title.

data.name: bodyClasses
data.description: Allows custom classes for styling the popover body.
